sentences: Hayato Ichihara (市原 隼人, Ichihara Hayato, February 6, 1987) is a Japanese actor who is best known for his roles in film and television, including the 2001 film All About Lily Chou-Chou.
In 2009 he was voted one of Oricon's "fresh Stars" of the year.
In 2009 he was also voted the 4th most attractive male celebrity in a swimsuit.
In 2011 in a poll by NTT DoCoMo
Ichihara was voted as having the 7th best abs based on 1,720 votes.
All About Lily Chou-Chou Riri Shushu no subete (2001) - Yuichi Hasumi
700 Days of Battle: Us vs. the Police (2008)
Sakura saku koro ni Kimi to (2019)
School Meals Time Final Battle (2020) - Yukio Amarida
Tom and Sawyer in the City (2021)
Runaways: For Your Love (TBS / 2011) - Ataru Katsuragi
Karamazov no kyodai (Fuji TV / 2013) - Isao Kuraosawa

The Sun Stands Still: The Eclipse (Wowow / 2020) - Ryūji Yamashita
The 13 Lords of the Shogun (NHK / 2022) - Hatta Tomoie
